items.text: flighted ball, wider outside off, driven through the covers to bring up an excellent half-century. His timing has really stood out today
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: shot. Not that short, and it's on off stump, so he has to clear his front leg and crouch a little to manufacture the room needed to pull it away over midwicket
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: full, angling into the pads, clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short, wide, cracked away to the right of the man sweeping at deep point
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: tosses it up from round the wicket, Shakib is forward to block
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: drifts into middle stump and Shakib, trying to drive down the ground, inside edges the ball onto his boot
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: pulls his length back on off stump, Shakib adjusts to that and pushes to cover
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: exploits the angle into his legs and turns the full ball to long leg
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: quicker ball on middle, Soumya is alert to the variation and blocks
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: slider, going on with the arm and Soumya, much like West Indies in their entire innings, plays for turn and gets an inside edge
items.postText: Mohammad Isam: Last time Soumya scored consecutive fifties was also in Ireland, in 2017, during a tri-series involving Ireland and New Zealand
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: PinkuBanajre: "I feel in love with Windies cricket because of Brian Lara but it pains me when I see them performing so below par but I will continue to support them because I love them. Let's hope they will be different team in World Cup. My heart say yes but my Brain says no..."
items.text: stays back, making room to the good length ball on off stump and punching it to long-off
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: calmly tucks the full one on the pads round the corner to deep square leg
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: rocks back and pulls the shortish delivery from outside off stump to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: dropped as steps out and hoicks it to midwicket. Roach is inside the circle, and it comes straight to him, and pops straight out
items.postText: Al Rafi Rusif: "Irony is, so many experts are even giving this west indies team a chance to win world cup, but nobody is counting on this Bangladesh team. Perhaps the "trophyless" tag Bangladesh has is the main reason behind it. :-("
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, he drives back at the bowler
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: keeps to his crease and lets his wrists do all the work, nudging a fairly full ball off his pads behind square leg
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: very full - almost a yorker - on middle stump. Shakib drills it to long-off
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, Soumya blocks towards point, looking for a single. Shakib says no
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: misfield at point, the man diving to his right to try and stop a deft little late cut from Soumya
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: sliding on with the arm on middle and leg, Shakib works it to midwicket
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: does well, spotting Shakib coming down the track, and then it's the batsman's turn to show some tricks, getting in position for the cut shot and almost getting it past short third man
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: now he hits that gap past short third man, helped, no doubt, by Chase going fast, short and outside off. All Shakib has to do is wait for the ball and give it direction.
items.shortText: Chase to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: steps out to the pitch of the ball on middle and leg and launches it down to long-on
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: another fine shot, this time going inside out so that the offbreak from round the wicket, meant to cramp him on middle and leg, is lifted back over the bowler's head. Superb strokeplay
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: taken at short cover! He's not to the pitch of the ball, having come down the track too early and giving Nurse the opportunity to change his length, and also go tight into his pads. It's a lot shorter now, it's a lot closer now, but Shakib is committed to the shot. Goes for the drive, tries to lift it over the infield, no such luck.
items.postText:
Mushfiqur Rahim is in at the stroke of drinks

Ravindra: "Al, you rock! But if cricket teams were songs, who would be pop?" Hmm, now that I've had some time to think, how bout New Zealand? They absolutely popped last time!
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, OUT

dismissal.text: Shakib Al Hasan c Chase b Nurse 29 (35b 3x4 0x6) SR: 82.85
